other_tests.findings: Documented hypoplastic, normally located thyroid glands.
Did not reveal the presence of thyroid tissue.
Only one patient had a mutation in the PAX8 gene (Q40P); three patients had no sequence alterations in the analyzed genes.

other_tests.date: At age 31 years for the mother
other_tests.findings: Mild hypothyroidism diagnosed with TSH of 14.8 mU/liter and a free T4 of 6.4 pmol/liter. Anti-TPO antibodies were positive at 201 U/ml.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Three years after initial diagnosis, her anti-TPO antibodies were still elevated at 150 U/ml.

other_tests.findings: No structural abnormalities in the renal system.
